<style type="text/css">

img[src$="#round"] {

}
img:hover {
  opacity: 0.8;
}
.icon-a {
    color: #FFF;
    background: #ed7732;
    border-radius: 2px;
    padding: 3px;
    font-size: 0.8em;
}
.btn {
  border: none;
  background-color: #B1BF88;
  padding: 14px 28px;
  font-size: 18px;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: inline-block;
  border-radius: 2%;
}
.btn:hover {background: #899566;}

.success {color: white;}


.box {
  height: auto;
  width: 100%;
  background-color: #f5f5f0;
  color: black;
  padding: 30px;
  border: solid 1px #ab9b8c;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

</style>
